title: CoPilot.ORM.Providers.SqlServer
description: CoPilot is an object relational mapper (ORM). In its core it works like a micro ORM, but it has some neat and powerful features added on top of it. This is the Sql Server provider.

packOptions.summary: Light weight object relational mapper (O/RM). MS SQL Provider.
packOptions.releaseNotes: Now targets netstandard1.6 for core applications and net46. Also added support for bulk commands.
